querySql: select CONVERT(varchar(10),CityID) + 'abc',HouseId,BuildingId,HouseName,HouseTypeCode,FloorNo,UnitNo,BuildArea,FrontCode,SightCode,UnitPrice,SalePrice,Weight,PhotoName,Remark,StructureCode,TotalPrice,PurposeCode,IsEValue,OldId,CreateTime,Valid,SaveDateTime,SaveUser,FxtCompanyId,IsShowBuildingArea,InnerBuildingArea,SubHouseType,SubHouseArea,Creator,NominalFloor,VDCode,FitmentCode,Cookroom,Balcony,Toilet,NoiseCode,HouseUniqueId,0 from FXTProject.dbo.DAT_House_csj with(nolock) where  ( ((CreateTime >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),DATEADD(D,-100,GETDATE()),120)) and CreateTime < CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),GETDATE(),120))) OR (SaveDateTime >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),DATEADD(D,-1,GETDATE()),120)) and SaveDateTime < CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),GETDATE(),120)))))
